basics.name: Souvik Maji
basics.label: Full Stack Developer
basics.summary: Hard-working and self-motivated Full-stack developer with a strong commitment to collaboration and solutions-oriented problem-solving. Experienced in Design and Development of End to End solutions using Restful APIs and Micro-services.

work.summary: Working as a Product Engineer in Paypermint - the next generation trusted payments platform engineered to power online businesses.
highlights: Involved in all stages of Product Development Lifecycle from understanding the Business Case to Implementation.
Worked extensively in Microservice Architecture using SQL & NoSql databases with GRPC as the communication protocol.
Designed and Implemented Paypermint's Invoicing and Subscription solution.
Lead the effort to migrate a legacy web application to Spring Web MVC with a Bootstrap dashboard theme.
Developed and maintained Restful APIs and Open Source API Wrapper Libraries in (Java, Python, Go, NodeJs) & mobile SDKs(Android, Cordova).
Created many Single Page Web Applications to support complex application workflows.
Experience in interacting with 3rd party vendors and clients to provide and support technical solutions.

work.summary: Backend Java Developer for various gaming products of Junglee Games - the fastest growing skill games company.
highlights: Created service for auto kyc verification of users based on a fuzzy name matching logic
Implemented a rule engine for calculating cashback bonus based on human readable rules
Developed backend for admin server for internal purpose
Optimized query performance for some critical time consuming sql operations upto 33%
Created scalable solution for showing live score for sport matches for Howzat app

work.summary: Senior Backend Engineer at the cross border engineering team taking care of international payments at Razorpay
highlights: Co-leading a pod of 9 engineers that manages international payments done via the Razorpay payment gateway.
Worked on design and implementation of international recurring payments using 3rd party international payment gateways.
Currently leading the effort for the implementation of B2B export payment transfers which will support large ticket transactions.
Optimized query performance for some critical time consuming sql operations upto 33%
Also working on designing of a new micro service to handle International PSP integrations.

projects.name: Rural Health Care Monitoring System
projects.description: Implemented a load balancing service to balance load in a wireless sensor network which is used to receive medical data from rural health care centres. Developed a web-based dashboard to be used by doctors to monitor patient data. Created a Medicine Reminder System.

projects.name: Bengali OCR
projects.description: Statistical language modelling of Bengali text to design a handwritten Bengali character recognition system.

projects.name: Foodcache
projects.description: Express based Web Application to keep track of money paid and received for office pantry. It gives monthly alerts to all its users via email and slack. The admin of this application can handle accounts and can view which users still owe money.

projects.name: Leaderboard
projects.description: Golang web application with a RESTful interface for managing game leaderboards. Benchmarked leaderboard calculation time for Redis vs PostgreSql database. Developed a single page JQuery Datatables based UI.

projects.name: Hobbit
projects.description: Static site generator written in Golang which uses git as a backend. Inspired from https://github.com/gollum/gollum

projects.name: Got-Bot
projects.description: Twitter bot that can post random content (media/text) from a particular subreddit.

projects.name: VBM - Virtual Brainfucking Machine
projects.description: VBM is a simple yet fast brainfuck interpreter.

projects.name: Cross The Road
projects.description: Arcade style game developed in JavaScript. Inspired from Frogger

volunteer.summary: Student body organisation to inform, discuss and further students knowledge of Linux based operating systems, Free Open Source Softwares and Tools
